SEARCH
Package gw.cc.claim.archiving.entity

Interface ClaimInfoCriteria

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
ArchivedClaimSearchCriteria, ClaimSearchCriteria
public interface ClaimInfoCriteria extends Serializable
ClaimInfoCriteria Encapsulates the search criteria for a ClaimInfo search. The system does not store ClaimInfoSearchCriteria entities, they are exist only for a search and are discarded after use.

  • Method Details

    • makeQuery

      @Deprecated("This method was accidentally exposed, and will be removed from the public API in the future. One of the performInfoSearch() or performInfoSearchWithoutSummary( ) methods should be used instead.") com.guidewire.pl.system.database.Query makeQuery()
      Returns a Claim query to find all claims that match this criteria. When run, the resulting query will return ClaimInfo entities.

    • makeViewQuery

      @Deprecated("This method was accidentally exposed, and will be removed from the public API in the future. One of the performInfoSearch() or performInfoSearchWithoutSummary( ) methods should be used instead.") com.guidewire.pl.system.database.Query makeViewQuery()
      Returns a Claim query to find all claims that match this criteria. When run, the resulting query will return ClaimInfoSearchView entities.

    • getSummaryRow

      @Deprecated("This method was accidentally exposed, and will be removed from the public API in the future. The alternative would be to call performInfoSearch().SummaryProcessor, though in theory there should never be a need to separately obtain a summary row IQueryBeanResult.") IQueryResult<? extends Bean,QueryRow> getSummaryRow()

    • performInfoSearch

      StandardQueryBeanResultWithSummary<Bean> performInfoSearch()
      Performs the search based on the criteria that have been established.
      Returns:
      A QueryProcessorWithSummaryQuery containing the results of the query, including the appropriate summary row

    • performInfoSearchWithoutSummary

      IQueryBeanResult<ClaimInfoSearchView> performInfoSearchWithoutSummary()
      Performs the search based on the criteria that have been established.
      Returns:
      A QueryProcessor containing the results of the query, without any summary row

    • getArchivedCount

      int getArchivedCount()
      Deprecated.
      Use gw.cc.claim.archiving.entity.ClaimInfoCriteria#hasArchivedClaims() instead.
      Get the number of archived claims
      Returns:

    • isArchivedSearch

      boolean isArchivedSearch()
      Returns:
      true if the claim search is for archived claims only.

    • isActiveSearch

      boolean isActiveSearch()
      Returns:
      true if the claim search is for live claims only.

    • hasArchivedClaims

      boolean hasArchivedClaims()
      Returns:
      true if there are archived claims that match the search criteria
